messages.content:
I've found a script that seems perfect for your request. To generate the ebook for 'Productividad', please run the following command in your terminal:

```bash
bash /storage/emulated/0/1A/Appinven/autoebook-hotmart/regenerar_faltantes.sh
```

This script will automatically generate the ebook for 'Productividad' and 'Desarrollo Personal' if they don't already exist. Let me know if you have any other questions.
